cards.title: Remote Sensing and Machine Learning for Water Accessibility in Maasai Regions
cards.description: Winner NeurIPS 2024 [Machine Learning for Social Impact High School Track] • Presented at NeurIPS Convention 2024 in Vancouver • US Patent Pending Number 63/703,232 • Presented at ML4EO 2024 Conference at Univ. of Exeter UK • Published in National High School Journal of Science [Dec 2024]

cards.title: Impact of Rainwater Harvesting Units On Maasai Regions in Northern Tanzania
cards.description: Published in National High School Journal of Science [Oct 2024] • Presidential Volunteer Service Award - Gold Medal [300+ Hours] • Presented at MDCON23 [Multi-District East-Africa Convention] Audience of 600+ delegates • Melvin Jones Humanitarian Service Award
